long_description:
# DG SPRINT: CORE
This is a lightweight sprinting mod that has no bells and whistles. Just sprinting.
It has a builtin API. You can extend this mod even further with use of the simple api calls.


## Sprint methods:
- Double tap with forward key
- Aux1 key

## Supported mods:
- Player_monoids
- Pova
- 3d Armor

## Works/Tested with:
- Hangglider

## API
WIP

### 1. Check if player is sprinting 
```lua
core.register_globalstep(function(dtime)
	local players = core.get_connected_players()
	for _, player in ipairs(players) do
		local sprinting = dg_sprint_core.is_sprinting(player)
		if sprinting then
			-- Code when sprinting is true
		else
			-- Code when sprinting is false
		end
	end
end)
```
### 2. Cancel a players sprint
```lua
core.register_globalstep(function(dtime)
	local players = core.get_connected_players()
	for _, player in ipairs(players) do
		if player:get_hp() < 10 then		
			dg_sprint_core.cancel_sprint(player)
		end
	end
end)
```
### 3. Change players sprint extra speed
```lua
core.register_globalstep(function(dtime)
	local players = core.get_connected_players()
	for _, player in ipairs(players) do
		if player:get_hp() < 10 then		
			dg_sprint_core.set_speed(player, 0.3)
		end
	end
end)
```
